p:
The mean progression period of the disease, between onset of symptoms and beginning of dyspnea, is eight days, and for mechanical ventilation to be required 10.5 days. Common laboratory findings include leucopenia and lymphopenia. Other findings may include increased lactic desidrogenase and creatinophosphokinase, in addition to increased liver enzymes. Hematological alterations can be related to bone marrow suppression, sequestration of lymphocytes or apoptosis.
14
